Description:
OPPOSITE PARKLANDS AND 2 YEARS YOUNG IN ARCADIA!!
A perfect investment in property, this as new 3 bedroom townhouse with its own street frontage and opposite parklands is situated in the highly sought Arcadia Estate and has outstanding tenants. No active owners corporation and featuring:
- Master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite. Sliding robes to secondary bedrooms, all a great size
- Light filled and open plan lounge and meals area, upstairs family room
- Kitchen with ample bench and cupboard space, stainless steel appliances
- Ducted heating, 2 x split system air conditioners
- Downstairs powder room, double garage with remote door and internal access
- Low maintenance backyard with synthetic turf
A short walk to Bridgewood Primary and Officer Secondary, and within close proximity to Freeway Access, Cardinia Road Train Station, Club Officer and multiple choices with Shopping Facilities.
PLEASE NOTE PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS

Description:

- Three good sized bedrooms with built in robes.

The home is excellent throughout and is ideally situated close to schools, shops and public transport.
The property is on a month to month lease at $1434 pcm.
An inspection will sure impress!!

Description:
Location and Style Postcode Perfect!
Beautiful Presentation
Low Care Gardens
Located in A Perfect Pocket
A great street presence is only the beginning of this outstanding Fairhaven built home, in a choice Officer location.
This beautifully presented home with 4 double bedrooms, the master with fitted out dressing room & ensuite, bedroom 2, 3 & 4 have built in robes, main bathroom is immaculate and modern.
Living space is perfect with a formal lounge, and separate pen plan family room with adjoining huge meals zone, modern and generous kitchen with great storage, dishwasher, upgraded appliances, stone bench tops, glass black splash back and walk in pantry, this extremely impressive kitchen is a standout.
Enjoy Alfresco dining and enjoyment year round with the decked outdoor space overlooking the peaceful and very tidy compact low maintenance yard.
Highlights-
Immaculate Presentation in and out
Big Bedrooms for Teenagers
Split System Air Conditioner
Ducted Heating
Select Double Glaze Windows
Double remote garage with internal access
Super convenient location that captures living in Officer perfectly, opposite Timbertop, walk to the café, future town centre, new medical centre and parklands all close by.
Why Build When You Can Secure This Beauty!

Description:
The ultimate home for modern day living
Situated in what locals would call the ultimate location, the highly sought-after Arcadia Estate, which is walking distance to shops, schools, public transport, parks, easy freeway access and much more, everything is at your fingertips.
Fantastically designed and tailored to modern day living, you can expect the highest of quality; The stunning kitchen is truly the heart of the home, open planned and welcoming in design, featuring; stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, ample storage space, overhead cupboard space, pantry, breakfast bar and more.
Situated downstairs is the open plan dining, powder room, kitchen and family room overlooking the concreted back yard making it the perfect spot for entertaining.
Upstairs are 3 great sized bedrooms, master with its own ensuite and double B.I.R, whilst the other rooms share the main bathroom and have B.I.R'S.
Other features of the home include; hydronic heating, external access from the garage, blinds throughout, electric shutters to dining & master bedroom, European laundry, split system air conditioning to lounge area, plenty of storage throughout, double garage on remote.
With not many townhouses available, don't miss your opportunity to enter the market with this immaculate beauty.

Description:
Start A Winning Life At Winland
With only 45 mins from Melbourne CBD, enjoy easy access to Metro train station and Monash Freeway, surrounded by wide range of quality schools, close to local amenities, Officer become one of the most sought-after suburbs in South East Growth Corridor for first home buyers and investors.
Peake Real Estate Proudly present Winland Estate one of the finest in Officer:
Only minutes from Officer Precinct
Easy access to Beaconsfield Station and Officer Station
3 minutes to get on Monash Freeway
Timbertop Café at door step
Adjoining to proposed government school and sports reserve
Block range from 250m2---519m2 approx.
Majority 12.5m and 14 m frontage
Stage 1 expect to title Mid 2020
On offer is a 340m2 (approx.) allotment, with 12.5 metre frontage which fits most of modern floor plans from major builders, bus stop and freeway right at your door step. Take advantage of small deposit and long settlement. Perfectly facing the proposed Government School, whether you are first home buyers, investors or downsizers, you are always a winner at Winland Estate. Start your winning life by contact Brix Cai today on 0433 925 529 for inspection and more information.

Description:
The ultimate home for modern day living!
Flawlessly presented, this home delivers a quality build and a functional family friendly design. The modern facade is certainly a stand out with its radiating visual appeal, first impressions will leave you wanting more.
Making a statement from the moment you step inside with a wide hallway entrance drawing you in with its spacious feel and high ceilings. The exclusive master suite showcasing an ensuite with double basin and walk in robe as well as a large shower. The remaining two bedrooms all boast ample amount of floor space and built in robes, offering roller shutters to the west facing windows serviced by the main bathroom with ample light and a neutral colour palate.
The home itself is tailored for entertaining with multiple living options, a spacious open plan kitchen offering quality stainless-steel appliances abundant storage including walk-in pantry.
The spacious outdoor area easily offers instant relaxation, with the oversized beautiful decked pergola area, raised vegetable garden and well-maintained yard.
Extra comforts include ducted heating, split system cooling, remote double garage with rear access and so much more.
Enjoying relaxation and convenience in equal measure, the home is mere footsteps from the Arena walking trails, Arena Shopping centre and public transport, doctors/specialists while easy access to the M1 and brilliant schooling.
Call now to inspect this one of a kind home in the ultimate location.

Description:
GRAND LIVING IN OFFICER!
We are proud to present to you this Immaculate Ex Carlisle Display Home. From the moment you step in the front door, you will be amazed by the grandeur and elegance this stunning property will have it all.
Comprising of 4 spacious bedrooms, the Master Suite includes a spacious ensuite with double vanity and large oversized shower with a separate toilet. The other three bedrooms all have double built-in robes, all serviced by the main bathroom.
The main living areas are spacious and well equipped with an impressive kitchen showcasing stone benchtops and stainless steel Technika appliances as well as a large walk-in pantry. Overlooking the meals area and family room with access to the alfresco via double sliding doors creating the perfect entertaining space. This well-designed floorplan also includes a theatre room which can be completely closed off from the rest of the home creating plenty of space for large families.
To add to the quality features of this amazing property you are spoilt with quality flooring, ducted heating and cooling, intercom system, alarm system, double lock up remote garage with internal access, manicured low maintenance gardens, garden storage and completed with a garden shed.
Situated conveniently close to the Arena shopping complex, public transport, well-regarded schools, including St Francis Xavier College and the M1 freeway making the commute to the CBD a breeze.
This property needs to be on your list this week to inspect! Contact Amanda 0409 009 887 or Dan 0418 148 157 today.

Description:
Compatible Smart with Location
Proudly situated in one of the most prestigious estate in Officer, the "Arcadia".
This beautifully positioned allotment of approximately 313 sqm is ready to be the site of your dream home. Surrounded by high calibre homes in a neighbourhood of obvious affluence, your family will thrive in this friendly community.
Officer is quickly becoming the go to suburb of the outer south eastern corridor with an array of existing, current and future amenities such as
• Cardinia Shire Civic Centre
• Supermarkets & Specialty Stores
• Restaurants & Cafes
• Cinema Complex
and many more local attributes.
With an easy commute of approx. 19mins to the major shopping precinct of the Fountain Gate Shopping Centre and the MI Freeway which for those of you who travel to the CBD is approx. 45 mins by car.
If you can see your family becoming part of this highly sought after community call today for further details.

Description:
Resort Style Living
No need to go away on holidays, you will not want to leave this property that offers the best in living and entertaining.
Situated in the popular Timbertop Estate in Officer, you will take advantage of the parklands, bike tracks, lake area and coffee shop, and still so close to townships of Beaconsfield & Berwick, public transport and local station.
This low maintenance property boasts landscaped gardens, aggregate drive way and paths, rear access and internal access from the bigger than standard garage.
Comprising a formal entry, lounge/theatre room, separate study, expansive kitchen, combining with stone benchtops, island preparation area complete with large drawers, cupboards, 900ml upright stove, dishwasher and pantry.
The adjoining dining and family room provides spacious open living with built in cabinetry there are also large double doors that offer easy access to the pool area.
Outdoors provides superb entertaining for family and friends alike, alfresco covered area with all year round blinds and heater, feature inground self-chlorinated solar heated pool & 5Kw solar power panels.
Other creatures comforts and extras include ducted heating, ducted vacuum and evaporative cooling, quality laminate flooring, carpets, extensive tiling inside and out and plantation shutters to most windows.
A home you will have many wonderful day enjoying the great lifestyle that you have, and coming home every day.

BRAND NEW LUXURY HOUSE AT WATER FRONT...!!!! TWO LIVING AREAS...!!!
UpHill Real Estate proudly presenting superbly designed Luxury Signal story house in highly desired Arcadia state. Surrounded by a wide range of quality schools, enjoy the calm lifestyle at natural water front
Your new home comes with:
- Master Bedroom with walking robes and ensuite
- Two more bedrooms with generous built in robes
- Open Plan dining & living
- Separate living area
- Laundry
- Main modern bathroom
- Panel lift double garage with remote
- Modern Kitchen with stainless steel 900mm Cooktop & Oven
- Alfresco
This home also comes with
- Stone Benchtop
- Undermount sink
- Dishwasher
- High ceiling
- Ducted heating
- Provision for Evaporative cooling
- Landscaping
- LED down lights
- Security alarm
- Concrete perimeter around the house
- Solar hot water
Your new Luxury home is located walking distance to
- Officer Secondary college (~600 meters)

Short drive to:
- Officer train station

If you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG and stamp duty savings
Call Chalith on 0452 327 583 to schedule a private inspection for you to flow through the house at your own phase with no distractions and feel all this home has to offer.
Private Inspections welcome!!!

Description:
FIRST HOME BUYERS SAVE $67,594.95!
FIRST HOME BUYERS BUY ME ON 1st JANUARY & SAVE $67,594.95
MORTGAGE INSURANCE $26,524.95**
STAMP DUTY SAVINGS. $31,070
FIRST HOME BUYERS GRANT $10,000
5% DEPOSIT IS ALL YOU NEED !!!!!!!
Government assistance loan subject to a first in basis. Conditions apply (single income $125,000 per annum, joint income $200,000).
Built by Australias Biggest builder in the prestige Savannah Estate this immaculate new home is complete and ready for immediate possession.
INCLUDED IN THE PRICE
No progress payments
Sound proofing
2.7 metre high ceilings
Timber floorboards
Upgrade front facade
LED Lights
Ceasar stone 40mm to kitchen
900 mm upright gas cooker
Caesar stone 20mm to bathroom & ensuite
Alarm system
Blinds
Exhaust fans
Flywire screens
Fencing to 3 sides
Landscaped gardens
Entertainers will appreciate this exciting new home with 4 bedrooms and 2 separate living areas.
The open plan design features high ceilings, a deluxe modern kitchen with caesarstone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and walk-in pantry.
The master bedroom includes full ensuite and walk-in robe. Bedrooms two, three and four include BIRs and are serviced by a large bathroom which includes separate bath and shower, stone vanity tops and impressive fixtures and fittings. The main living/dining area has sliding door access to the alfresco and professionally landscaped gardens setting the perfect atmosphere for indoor/outdoor living.
Added features include but not limited to remote control double garage, ducted heating, alarm system, blinds, high ceilings, double glazed windows and large laundry!
This modern home is a polished package that includes all the upgrades youd wish for in other homes.
Nestled in a most sought after Savannah estate location. Close to parklands, top Primary and Secondary schools and Beaconsfield shopping centre. This home will not disappoint!
This property will suit first home buyers, investors and downsizers.
** Based on a sale price of $600,000

Description:
TIMBERTOP FAMILY ENTERTAINER
CLOSING DATE - TUES 18/02 AT 6:00PM
(Unless Sold Prior)
Extending enjoyment inside and out, this stunning single level residence delivers perfection at every turn with its beautifully appointed interior, modern alfresco deck and beautiful landscaped gardens that have been specifically designed for low-maintenance appeal.
Set in Officers highly desirable Timbertop estate, this quality custom-built home would be ideal for those wanting spacious open-plan living in a family friendly neighbourhood! Boasting;
- Stunning kitchen with stone benches, stainless steel appliances, ample storage space and a walk-in pantry.
- 4 large bedrooms including; master with walk-in robe & ensuite.
- 3 expansive living zones including; family/meals area, rumpus & a theatre room.
- Outdoor decked alfresco featuring a wood-fire coonara heater and fully retractable outdoor blinds, perfect for entertaining all year round.
Further complemented by; gas ducted heating, split system air-con, laminate flooring throughout, video intercom, security system, security doors, an oversized double garage with internal access, landscaped/low maintenance rear yard & much much more.
Located within close proximity to public transport, shops, parklands, DAngelos winery and renowned local Primary & Secondary schools including; St Brigid's, St Francis Xavier, Beaconhills, Officer Primary and Berwick College.

Description:
WHEN LOCATION AND POTENTIAL MEET!
The rare opportunity to purchase this admired lifestyle property in an area that is so close to facilities, excellent schools and transport options, only moments to the UGB which provides some potential going forward, but the advantages of living on a well established parcel allows ample room for all animal pursuits whether its cattle, horses or goats to name a few. A well presented character filled home that enjoys two separate living areas, three spacious bedrooms with the main having both a WIR and ensuite. Timber kitchen with all the modern amenities, ideal sized laundry with cupboards and benches, large rear deck and timber decked verandahs are also featured. High ceilings, ceiling roses, box bay windows and importantly a lovely homely feel can be felt while wandering through this family home. The land is extremely well maintained and is fenced into 7 main paddocks and 2 smaller paddocks. Gently undulating with ample water three dams and a running creek. The property has a workshop/machinery/hay shed, stockyards, loading ramp and a crush, double garage, storage area and an additional living space adds to the appeal. The potential is self evident, being only a stones throw to the Residential UGB boundary yet far enough to have the quiet lifestyle. There is plenty on offer here and the benefits will be evident for years to come with this outstanding property. An inspection will impress!!

Description:
Start A Winning Life At Winland!
With only 45 mins from Melbourne CBD, enjoy easy access to Metro train station and Monash Freeway, surrounded by wide range of quality schools, close to local amenities, Officer become one of the most sought-after suburbs in South East Growth Corridor for first home buyers and investors.
Peake Real Estate Proudly present Winland Estate one of the finest in Officer:
Only minutes from Officer Precinct
Easy access to Beaconsfield Station and Officer Station
3 minutes to get on Monash Freeway
Timbertop Café at door step
Adjoining to proposed government school and sports reserve
Block range from 250m2---519m2 approx.
Majority 12.5m and 14 m frontage
Stage 1 expect to title Mid 2020
On offer is a 340m2 (approx.) allotment, with 12.5 metre frontage - fits most of modern floor plans from major builders, bus stop and freeway just at door step, take advantage of a small deposit and long settlement. Whether you are first home buyers, investors or downsizers, you are always a winner at Winland Estate. Start your winning life by contact Brix Cai today on 0433 925 529 for inspection and more information.

Description:
A Rare Gem
This magnificent young family home on just under a ¼ acre of land is situated in the prestigious Timber Top Estate surrounded by luxury homes.
Boasting 4 bedrooms master with bedroom with walk in robe, full ensuite with stone bench tops and his & hers vanities, remaining bedrooms with easily accommodate queen size beds. Stunning kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 900ml gas cook top, island bench with stone tops overlooking the large sun filled meals/family area, follow the beautiful floors to the kids retreat area. A great deal of thought has gone into the designing of the home, so there's space for the whole family. Outside you can entertain all year round under the alfresco while watching the kids having fun on the huge block of 938m2.
Extra comforts include oversize remote control double garage with internal access plus side access for the boat, caravan, trailer etc, ducted heating, split system cooling, dishwasher, high ceilings, and so much more. With all major amenities at your fingertips, schools, hospitals, Tafe, uni, Noosal High School and freeway access. You will have to wait a long time to find a home like this that has it all.

Description:
Spacious Townhouse In Arena Estate Location
Located in the ever-popular Arena Estate, this home will be sure to tick the boxes with such impressive features, a superb setting and sure capital growth.
Downstairs you have a spacious living area, powder room and heart of the home features a well-appointed kitchen with plenty of cupboard and bench space as well as stainless steel appliances, meals and a great separate living space for comfort. Comprising of three great sized bedrooms with master entailing walk in robe and ensuite, the remaining two bedrooms boast a good floor space and built in robes. They are serviced by the main bathroom.
Offering a lifestyle of complete ease with artificial grass to the backyard allowing a great space for entertaining. A remote access double garage ensures safety and security with direct access into the backyard space. Ducted heating and a split system air conditioner will provide comfort year-round.
Equipped with the amenities you could want in a location, including, shops, cafes, petrol station and schooling very close by. You are also conveniently located within walking distance to the Cardinia Park train station and have easy access to the M1 freeway.
Overlooking the water this townhouse is a sure investment and wont last long.

Description:
This Outstanding Property Is A Must Inspect!
Set amidst other quality properties is this modern family home featuring four spacious bedrooms, master with full ensuite and walk in robe, second bathroom, separate formal living at the front plus a further spacious light filled open planned family and dining area at the rear of home. A stylishly designed fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances looks across to the outdoor covered entertaining area, there is a remote controlled double garage with direct personal access to the home plus plenty of extra space available on the opposite side of the property to install gates allowing for further housing of vehicles, caravans, boats, extra. Features include striking tonings with laminated flooring, tiling, and new wall to wall carpets, window furnishings plus central heating and evaporative cooling for all year round comfort. Positioned in the Aspect Estate within minutes of Officers many attractive facilities including, Arena Shopping Centre, Cardinia Railway Station, Club Officer, Primary and Secondary schools, freeway access, Lakeside Square Town Centre, plus much, much more. Inspect Today, Move In Tomorrow!
Inspect Saturday 1.00 -1.30pm or by Appointment contact Dale 0417 593 182
Photo ID Required
